mapper.select: select coupon_user.coup_num, coupon_user.user_coup_id, coupon_user.user_coup_use_yn, coupon_user.coup_start_d, coupon_user.coup_end_d, coupon_all.coup_name, coupon_all.coup_dis_rate from coupon_user, coupon_all where coupon_user.user_coup_id = #{userCoupId} and coupon_user.coup_num = coupon_all.coup_num and coupon_user.user_coup_use_yn='n' and coupon_user.coup_end_d > DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(), '%Y-%m-%d');
